description: Add tooltip element using popover and anchor positioning
context:
Beads description:
Native tooltip using HTML popover attribute and CSS anchor positioning. No JavaScript required - pure HTML/CSS implementation. Should support positioning (top, bottom, left, right), light/dark themes, and integrate with Graffiti's theming system. Uses modern CSS: anchor-name, position-anchor, and popover API.
